Body: Possible Duplicate:  How do I update the OS in my device?  I have a samsung galaxy s GT-I9000 and I want to update it. I have android 2.3.3 but I read there's an update to 2.3.5 or even 2.3.6 with a value pack. I plugged my phone on my pc and I installed Kies but it tells me I have the latest version. Is android 2.3.3 the latest version for my device? What can I do ?Thanks!ps: in that case I want to remain using only official updates.ps2: the OTA updater tells me theres' no update available...
Title: How to update my galaxy s?

history.Text: I have a samsung galaxy s GT-I9000 and I want to update it. I have android 2.3.3 but I read there's an update to 2.3.5 or even 2.3.6 with a value pack. I plugged my phone on my pc and I installed Kies but it tells me I have the latest version. Is android 2.3.3 the latest version for my device? What can I do ?Thanks!ps: in that case I want to remain using only official updates.ps2: the OTA updater tells me theres' no update available...
How to update my galaxy s?

Is android 2.3.3 the latest version for my device? What can I do ?Thanks!ps: in that case I want to remain using only official updates.ps2: the OTA updater tells me theres' no update available...
